channel.title: A few mod bugs/improvements
channel.description:
* the 'rollangle' CVAR has to have FCVAR_ARCHIVE flag - it keeps reseting every launch now.
* the amount of emitted particles (dust/smoke/blood) when there is a VPhys friction with items/ragdolls is really distracting and looks cheap - physic_shared.cpp is your friend.
* u should be able to turn the viewmodel side swing interpolation off (HL2 TM). It looks distracting and sometimes rly weird.

Hola, i noticed some mistakes in the game so far.

  1. in bm_c1a2b a scientist in a room isn’t speaking, his mouth moves and he makes gestures but there’s no sound.

  2. In the lockerroom where Gordon has his locker there is a texture missing. In the locker from Boetsma the ceiling is missing.

  3. Most women don’t have subtitels when you speak with them, like 90% of them. Language german.
